by_continuing_you_agree_to_our: By continuing, you agree to our

get_started_screen.title: Welcome to {{appName}}
get_started_screen.description: Store, organize, and secure your data effortlessly.

walkthrough_screen.walkthrough_description_1: Quickly capture and save images, videos, links, and more from any app. Keep all your important content in one secure place.
walkthrough_screen.walkthrough_description_2: Easily categorize your items into {{nest}} (folders) and {{nest_stack}} (groups of items) to keep everything neat and accessible.
walkthrough_screen.walkthrough_description_3: Your data is encrypted with a secret password that only you know. Be careful—if lost, your data cannot be recovered!

select_mode_screen.title: Select Mode
select_mode_screen.offline_mode_description: Your data is stored only on your device (no cloud backup).
select_mode_screen.login_and_sync_description: Securely store your data and sync across devices.

secrey_key_screen.title: Secure Your Data with an Encryption Key
secrey_key_screen.description: This encryption key protects your data. Keep it safe—losing it means losing access to your stored content.
secrey_key_screen.warning_description: I understand that I must save this key securely. If lost, my data cannot be recovered.

validation.min_length: Secret key must be at least {{secretKeyMinLength}} characters
validation.select_check_box: Please select the checkbox to continue

validation.profile_invalid: Invalid profile picture.(Supported formats: jpg, png, jpeg)
validation.username_min_length: Username must be at least {{usernameMinLength}} characters

home_screen.empty_nest_description: Start adding items like images, notes, links, and more. Organize everything in one secure place!

drawer_screen.logout_confirmation_description: Are you sure you want to logout?

all_nest_screen.empty_nest_description: Start adding items like images, notes, links, and more. Organize everything in one secure place!
all_nest_screen.delete_nest_confirmation_description: Are you sure you want to delete this nest?
all_nest_screen.wipe_nest_confirmation_description: Are you sure you want to wipe this nest?

validation.min_length: Nest name must be at least {{nestNameMinLength}} characters
